slides.title: BONDI BEACH ATTACK
slides.notes: Welcome the students. Topic: News report on the Bondi Beach incident, focusing on community response.

slides.title: LEAD-IN: SYDNEY
slides.content:
• Where is this beach?
  • What is Sydney famous for?
  • Have you ever been to a beach like this?
slides.notes: Elicit 'Bondi Beach' and 'Australia'. Build the context.

slides.title: WHAT IS A HERO?
slides.content:
• What qualities does a 'hero' have?
  • Can 'ordinary' people be heroes?
  • Think of 3 words to describe a hero.
slides.notes: Brainstorm qualities. Set the stage for acts of civilian bravery in the report.

slides.title: TASK 1: VOCABULARY MATCH

pairs.def: Something aimed at a specific person or place.
Being cared for by doctors in a hospital.
To remove a weapon from someone.
Feeling like something is too much to handle.
A very close and supportive community.

shuffled.def: To remove a weapon from someone.
A very close and supportive community.
Feeling like something is too much to handle.
Being cared for by doctors in a hospital.
Something aimed at a specific person or place.

slides.notes: Focus on 'disarm' and 'tight-knit' as they appear in the video.

slides.title: TASK 1: ANSWERS

pairs.def: Something aimed at a specific person or place.
Being cared for by doctors in a hospital.
To remove a weapon from someone.
Feeling like something is too much to handle.
A very close and supportive community.

slides.notes: Drill pronunciation. Use CCQs: 'If a group is tight-knit, do they help each other?'

slides.title: TASK 2: GIST LISTENING
slides.content:
Listen to the first part of the report.

What happened at Bondi Beach, and why were people gathered there?

slides.title: TASK 2: ANSWER KEY
slides.explanation: Two men fired at a Hanukkah celebration in a park at Bondi Beach.
slides.notes: Clarify that Hanukkah is a Jewish festival.

slides.title: TASK 3: LISTENING FOR DETAIL
questions: What is the status of the gunmen?
How did Ahmed Al Ahmed help?
slides.notes: Advise students to write short notes.

slides.title: TASK 3: ANSWER KEY
slides.explanation: 15 died, one gunman dead, one arrested. People hid in a surf club. Ahmed disarmed a gunman.
slides.notes: Focus on the bravery of Ahmed and the surf club responders.

slides.title: TASK 4: UNDERSTANDING ADVICE
slides.content:
Tick the advice mentioned:

  • [✓] Rare event in Australia.
  • [ ] Watch news all day.
  • [✓] Focus on good things.
  • [✓] Talk to parents/teachers.
  • [✓] Okay to switch off.
slides.notes: Discuss mental health: Why is 'switching off' good advice?

slides.title: TASK 5: REFLECTION
slides.content:
'Tight-knit'

  • How does a community help after a tragedy?
  • Why focus on 'light' over 'darkness'?
slides.notes: Final discussion. Elicit 'support', 'solidarity', and 'helping each other'.
